摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

android.provider
类 Settings

java.lang.Object
  android.provider.Settings

public final class Settings
extends Object

The Settings provider contains global system-level device preferences.

嵌套类摘要
static class Settings.Bookmarks
          User-defined bookmarks and shortcuts.
static class Settings.Gservices
          Gservices settings, containing the network names for Google's various services.
static class Settings.NameValueTable
          Common base for tables of name/value settings.
static class Settings.Secure
          Secure system settings, containing system preferences that applications can read but are not allowed to write.
static class Settings.SettingNotFoundException
           
static class Settings.System
          System settings, containing miscellaneous system preferences.
 
字段摘要
static String ACTION_AIRPLANE_MODE_SETTINGS
          
构造方法摘要
Settings()
           
 
方法摘要
static String getGTalkDeviceId(long androidId)
          Returns the device ID that we should use when connecting to the mobile gtalk server.
static String getJidResource()
          Returns the GTalk JID resource associated with this device.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

构造方法详细信息







Settings


public Settings()














方法详细信息







getJidResource


public static String getJidResource()




Returns the GTalk JID resource associated with this device.






返回：
String  the JID resource of the device. It uses the device IMEI in the computation
 of the JID resource. If IMEI is not ready (i.e. telephony module not ready), we'll return
 an empty string.










getGTalkDeviceId


public static String getGTalkDeviceId(long androidId)




Returns the device ID that we should use when connecting to the mobile gtalk server.
 This is a string like "android-0x1242", where the hex string is the Android ID obtained
 from the GoogleLoginService.





参数：
androidId - The Android ID for this device.

返回：
The device ID that should be used when connecting to the mobile gtalk server.
